data.title: David Brin – Audio Books, Best Sellers, Author Bio
data.meta_description: Learn more about David Brin. Browse David Brin’s best-selling audiobooks and newest titles. Discover more authors you’ll love listening to on Audible.
data.text:
The Postman

By: David Brin

Narrated by: Kevin Kenerly

Length: 9 hrs and 55 mins

Unabridged

Overall

4.5 out of 5 stars 1,774

Performance

4.5 out of 5 stars 1,590

Story

4.5 out of 5 stars 1,583

This is the story of a lie that became the most powerful kind of truth. A timeless novel as urgently compelling as War Day, David Brin’s The Postman is the dramatically moving saga of a man who rekindled the spirit of America through the power of a dream....

5 out of 5 stars

Neither snow nor rain nor heat nor gloom of night

By Ed Pegg Jr on 12-09-20
